title: Endless Emporium
description: A collaberative project in a front end course. This was a minimalist design with a lot of working concepts. We also had a time limit to get the project done so a few missing components to really finish it off. Built with React, Node.js two API's and Tailwind

title: Foodie-Mate
description: A collaberative project in a front end course. Welcome to Foodie-Mate, where culinary exploration meets personalized convenience! Built with Javascript, API integration and bootstrap

title: Weather Dashboard
description: interactive web application provides users with current and future weather forecasts. Designed for ease of use, it's perfect for planning your day with up-to-date weather information. Built with JS, JQuery, Weather API, Day.js and bootstrap

title: Work-day-Scheduler
description: Welcome to the Work Day Scheduler project! This practical web application is designed to help users efficiently organize and plan their workday with an easy-to-use interface. Built with Javascript, Day.JS

title: Quiz game
description: Welcome to the Quiz Game project! This engaging web application provides a fun and interactive way to test your knowledge on various topics through timed quizzes. Built with Javascript

title: Early portfolio builder
description: Early days of buiding websites. My first mini portfolio. We all have to start somewhere :)

title: Project Management tool
description: A tool for keeping your tasks organised and on track either by yourself or with a team. Built with React and Javascript
